casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Edwin Wayne JOYCE. No. 194P03-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2006. Robert Montgomery, William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of November 2006 by Defendant to Order Superior Court to hear case:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of December 2006."
